lead_paragraph: Buffalo Sabres forward Evander Kane surrendered to police on Friday and was charged with criminal trespass and harassment in connection with a June incident at a Buffalo bar.

headline.print_headline: Sabres' Kane Charged With Harassment for Bar Incident
headline.main: Sabres' Kane Charged With Harassment for Bar Incident
